Even if you learn the theory perfectly and learn by heart what formation has what probability of success, how to define appropriate support levels, there is still no guarantee that you will make money, because in the end it will be you, a human, who will decide, and a human is not a rational machine, only emotional. So you will make mistakes that will cause you to make more mistakes because they will affect your emotions and thus your decissions. Study slowly, day by day, and keep trading. All you need is $10 in your account to be able to open your first position  and learn to control your emotions and remain somewhat rational.
